body:
# Spring Home Selling Checklist

Use this checklist to prepare your home for the strongest possible launch in the spring market.

## 30 Days Before Listing

- Declutter and depersonalize
- Book minor repairs
- Meet with your listing agent

## 14 Days Before Listing

- Deep clean and stage
- Finalize photography schedule
- Review pricing strategy

## Launch Week

- Confirm MLS details
- Prepare showing instructions
- Review open house plan
title: Westchester Spring Home Selling Checklist
author: jane-smith
excerpt: A practical, week-by-week checklist to prepare your home and launch with confidence.
